preference.name: Mes0MESTXLibraryRevisionDisplayNameColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Stores the internal names of BOP Line properties whose display names appear as columns from left-to-right for Standard Text library structures in CME applications. This preference value is only a repository, and it is not to be modified other than by the code itself.
